text: My son absolutely loves his time at STAR LEARNER @ Jalan Bukit Merah ! The teachers are incredibly friendly, kind, and patient, creating a warm and welcoming environment for all the children. I've noticed how quickly my son is learning new things, and it's amazing to see his progress every day. The kids are also very friendly, which makes it a great place for social development. I highly recommend this childcare to any parent looking for a safe, nurturing, and educational place for their little one!

My child recently enrolled into PG class and has been enjoying his time so far! He loves his teachers Lu Laoshi, Teacher Mandy and Teacher Ang! They have been caring towards my boy. He eats well naps well and plays well with his peers. Thank you teachers!
My daughter recently enrolled into PG class. She enjoy her time at there. Thx for teachers caring.
Star Learners @Bukit Merah's preschool teachers are friendly and professional. My son enjoys going to school.
